eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\label{eemn}
\bar{\eta} = -(1 + \partial_\mu T \partial^\mu T),~~~
\bar{\eta}^{\mu\nu} = \eta^{\mu\nu} -
\frac{\partial^\mu T \partial^\nu T}{1
+ \partial_\rho T \partial^\rho T},
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{tmne}
T_{\mu\nu} = - \frac{T_3 V(T)}{\sqrt{- X}}\;
\left[ -\eta_{\mu\nu} X
+ \frac{1}{2}\left( C_{\mu\rho}(\partial_\nu T \partial^\rho T
+ F_\nu^{~\rho}) +  C_{\nu\rho}(\partial_\mu T \partial^\rho T
+ F_\mu^{~\rho})\right)\right],
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{XX1}
X 
= -(1-\dot T^2) ( 1+ {\bf B}^2) + {\bf E}^2 
+({\bf E}\cdot {\bf B})^2.
\

\begin{eqnarray} \label{emtensor}
&&T_{11} = - T_3 \frac{V}{\sqrt{-X}}(1-\dot T^2)(1+B_1^2), \nonumber \\
&&T_{22} = - T_3 \frac{V}{\sqrt{-X}}\left[
         (1-\dot T^2)(1+B_2^2) - E_0^2 \right], \nonumber \\
&&T_{33} = - T_3 \frac{V}{\sqrt{-X}} ( 1-\dot T^2 - E_0^2 ), \nonumber\\
&&T_{12} = - T_3 \frac{V}{\sqrt{-X}}(1-\dot T^2)B_1 B_2.
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{ts}
T(t) = T_0\sinh^{-1}\left(
    a_+e^{(\dot T_\infty/T_0)\,t}-a_-e^{-(\dot T_\infty/T_0)\,t}\right),
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& E_0\partial_0 G = 0, \label{gf}\\
&&\partial'^2_0 a_i - {v'}^2\partial'^2_1 a_i
     - \frac{E_0}{(1+{\bf B}_0^2)^2 - E_0^2 B_2^2}\partial_i G = 0, \\
&& \partial'^2_0 \hat{t} - {v'}^2\partial'^2_1 \hat{t} = 0,
\

\begin{eqnarray} \label{ebprime}
{\bf E}'_{0} &\equiv & E'_0 \hat{{\bf x}}' 
             = v' \hat{{\bf x}}' ,\nonumber\\
{\bf B}'_{0} &\equiv & B'_1 {\hat {\bf x}}' + B'_2 \hat{{\bf y}}' \nonumber\\
         & = & \frac{E_0}{v'} \left[ B_1 \hat{{\bf x}}'
        + \frac{\dot T_\infty^2 (1+{\bf B}_0^2)}%
               {(1+{\bf B}_0^2)^2 - E_0^2 B_2^2} B_2 \hat{{\bf y}}' \right] .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
E(t) &=& B_0 \left[1 - \frac{\dot T_i^2}{4(1+k^2T_0^2)}
    \left(1+2k^2T_0^2+k^2T_0^2\sinh^2\left(\frac{t}{T_0}\right)\right)
    \right], \nonumber \\
W_E(t) &=& t - \frac{\dot T_i^2}{8(1+k^2T_0^2)}\left[
    (4+6k^2T_0^2)t + (2+k^2T_0^2)\sinh\left(\frac{2t}{T_0}\right) \right]. 
\

\begin{eqnarray}\label{eemn}
\bar{\eta} = -(1 + \partial_\mu T \partial^\mu T),~~~
\bar{\eta}^{\mu\nu} = \eta^{\mu\nu} -
\frac{\partial^\mu T \partial^\nu T}{1
+ \partial_\rho T \partial^\rho T},
